modName: Ronnie Magnum - Stories of Northern Lands
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffff00]Ronnie Magnum - Stories of Northern Lands[/color] (2013-2014)

This compilation includes musical tracks written by Ronnie Magnum for The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim fan-made mods - "[url=http://anvilbay.ru/files/gloomy-grove-/]Gloomy Grove[/url]", "[url=http://anvilbay.ru/files/ebenvund/]Ebenvund: The Lost Citadel[/url]" and "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47130]Krirg Manor[/url]".

[color=#ffff00]Tracklist[/color]:
1 - Gloomy Grove - Fallen Hero
2 - Ebenvund - No Sign Of Human Presence
3 - Ebenvund - The Lost Souls
4 - Ebenvund - Clash
5 - Krirg Manor - Green Grotto
6 - Krirg Manor - Berry Sunset
7 - Krirg Manor - Forest Strings

***

[color=#ffff00]
Also:
[/color]
Wanna see my another Skyrim mods? Check my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2931683]Skyrimnexus page[/url].

Or join me on Patreon if you like my works!

[center][url=https://www.patreon.com/RonnieMagnum][img]https://s2.postimg.org/sozpl03qx/Pat_Logo.jpg[/img][/url][/center]
author: Ronnie Magnum
